Teaching

The STLab provides the following courses.

Course Instructor Program
Software Architectures and Methodologies Enrico Vicario, Roberto Verdecchia Master Computer Engineering
Software Engineering for Embedded Systems Laura Carnevali, Imad Zaza Master Computer Engineering
Quantitative Evaluation of Stochastic Models Enrico Vicario, Benedetta Picano Master Computer Engineering
Software Dependability Alessandro Fantechi Master Computer Engineering
Software Engineering Enrico Vicario Bachelor Computer Engineering
Industrial Informatics Alessandro Fantechi Bachelor Computer Engineering
Fundamentals of Computer Science Laura Carnevali, Benedetta Picano Bachelor Electronic Engineering, Bachelor Mechanical Engineering, Bachelor Management Engineering
Software Engineering Imad Zaza Bachelor Management Engineering

For all students of the University of Florence, the current thesis topics are available on the thesis page.
